Our story this week reproduces startling estimates (by McKinsey) of learning loss caused by covid school disruptions. Huge lags in some populous places: India, Brazil, Mexico, Bangladesh. Boris Johnson’s government has collapsed at last. For months Britain’s prime minister wriggled out of one scandal after another. He has asked to stay until the autumn, but he should go immediately https://t.co/RklTIylpZV

Boris Johnson is resigning as the leader of Britain’s Conservative Party.
He reportedly wants to stay on in a caretaker capacity until the autumn while a new leader is chosen.
